questions.question: Your team is developing a recommendation system that needs to analyze large-scale user interaction data and generate personalized recommendations in real time. When should you consider using GPUs for this task?
options: When the recommendation model is a simple linear model with small-scale data
When the recommendation model is based on deep learning techniques requiring fast training and inference
When the model requires frequent updates and quick iterations
When the deployment environment strictly limits power consumption
correct_answers: When the recommendation model is based on deep learning techniques requiring fast training and inference
